identity.mission: Create a distinctive, professional financial tool that breaks the 'generic SaaS' mold using density, depth, and intentional asymmetry.
identity.theme_strategy: Professional Fintech Dark Mode (Archetype 7 mixed with Swiss Logic)

rules: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a modern, geometric, yet human feel.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial figures, transaction IDs, and tabular data for perfect alignment.
Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + Tiny + Wide Spacing (tracking-[0.2em]).
NEVER use pure black (#000000). Use #0B0C10 for depth.
Gradients are allowed ONLY as subtle glows or 'tracing beams', never for full backgrounds.
Glassmorphism: Use bg-black/40 with backdrop-blur-xl for sticky headers and modals.
Borders: All cards must have a 1px border of white/10 (border-white/10).

layout_strategy.grid_system: The Bento Grid (Mode B for Dashboard)

modes.name: Dashboard Grid
modes.usage: Main dashboards. Use col-span-2 or col-span-3 for main charts.

cards.style: Flat, sharp or minimal radius (rounded-md), dark grey bg (#15171E), 1px border (#2D3748).

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-md

tables.style: compact, row-hover effects, sticky header, mono-font for numbers.

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, thin border-r border-border/40, bg-background/95 backdrop-blur.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity-5) to the main background to reduce digital sterility.

login_background.description: Abstract blue geometric shapes with glowing edges
login_background.usage: Full screen background for Login/Register pages with overlay.

society_hero.usage: Society Switcher card backgrounds or Dashboard welcome banner.

implementation_instructions.styling: Tailwind CSS + inline styles for dynamic values
implementation_instructions.charts: recharts (via shadcn/ui charts if available, or raw recharts)
steps: 1. Setup Tailwind config with the 'Midnight Ledger' palette.
2. Install/Update Shadcn components to match the 'Cards' and 'Inputs' styles defined above.
3. Create the 'Layout' component with Sidebar and Navbar using the glassmorphism rules.
4. Build the 'Dashboard' using the Bento Grid system.
5. Implement 'Transactions' and 'Reports' using dense tables and recharts.
6. Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or center-aligned layouts everywhere.
Dark Mode First: Design for dark mode primarily. Ensure text contrast is > 4.5:1.
Density: This is a financial app. Don't waste space. Use compact tables and grids.
Feedback: Every action needs a toast (Sonner) or visual state change.
No Emojis: Use professional icons (Lucide/Heroicons) only.
Data-Test-ID: MANDATORY for all buttons, inputs, and links.
